name: Clone2048
description:
In the year 2048,the entire planet of Wuberan has been pollution by a mysterious virus. 

Dr. Wong is assigned to investigate the all event.

 when he arrive there with his clone soldier ....  

Ok that's all i can create about the game stroy lol.

It kind of new type of game. 

we try to combie Tower Defence(TD) game experience with match 3 game. 

you can give it a try to see you like it or not. 

hope you can have great time while playing it. 

If you have anything want to share with us, please level a feed back or join our Discord

Also we are not native english speaker, so any localization help would be really helpful.  (other language also welcome!)

The game is not complete  yet, so first things first we will complete all levels as we design to be (around 40~50 levels).

and add some future for the End-Game . like endlss level challenge, or get some powerful equipment by kill a Boss.

if we can some income from the game. we would love to publish a Steam version. so that we can use the workshop future to let you guys create the level by yourself and share to each other.

i think that would so fun !

Fist, thanks for supporting us!

👉-> The game is NOT COMPLETE yet <-👈

 it's have 15 levels for now . and we will add more future ASAP. you can check the update log here.

we are two person full-time developer. 

To keep the studio running healthily. we need some income. but the current version is not worth the full price. so we decide to make a 70% OFF. that may or may not be change in the future.

If we can have some income from the game, we would love to publish a Steam version for use the workshop future. 

in that case, we may or may not close the Itch version download and give you a SteamKey inside. it's not been decide yet. we would love to hear what you think about it.

Again, thanks for supporting us!

If you have anything want to share with us, please level a feed back or join our Discord
